name: Revamp-wordpress-theme-editor
body:
This is my utopia dream .. creating this advanced online Wordpress editor for themes and plugins. 

I'm waiting for Gary Cao permission, cose this is his idea. 

This link have pictures and description that can better describe the purpose and actions for editor. 
http://www.garyc40.com/2011/03/gsoc-2011-idea-revamp-wordpress-theme-plugin-code-editor/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
